name: Crystal Hunt (Jonah H-W)
description:
Instructions:

- Connect all crystals of the same colour (so far, just red and blue), then exit through the golden tile

Controls:

- wasd or left stick/D-pad to move

- space or A (xbox) to start a path

- r or select (xbox) to reset

Source is located in this Github repo
(This could eventually include future versions of the game; I added it before the jam finished and before I knew that was against the rules to include links to those. However, the version that was complete before the jam is the only set of binaries that are provided and will remain the only ones at least until the jam is finished.)

Credits:

- Dungeon tileset from Elthen on Open Game Art, who requested that a link to their Patreon be included

- Music is from Dark Fantasy Studio (specifically, Silent walk on the album Chronicles of the illusion world. The license was purchased through a Humble Music Bundle, and does not allow me to provide a direct download (because of that, it's temporary and will be replaced if I develop this game further).
